short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Sweet World HTML5 game for free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready for a sweet journey that takes place in a magical candy land! Find two identical candies that can be connected by three or fewer straight lines. Connecting tiles open up new options to further clear the level. Plenty of exciting and challenging puzzles await you in Sweet World. Make sure to share the game with your friends and compare your high scores!

If you want to play more different games, just click the More Games button in the pupup menu.
